name: Continuous Glucose Monitor (CGM)
description: Wearable sensor (usually on arm) that continuously tracks interstitial glucose levels, providing real-time data on metabolic health. Reveals hidden glucose spikes from foods, exercise, stress, and sleep. Key tool for metabolic optimization even in non-diabetics.

dosage.notes: Major brands: Dexcom G7, Abbott Freestyle Libre 3, Stelo (OTC). Non-diabetics: use for 1-3 months to learn personal responses, then periodically recheck.

keyFindings: Reveals individual glucose responses vary enormously to identical foods (Zeevi et al., Cell)
Glucose variability (not just average) predicts cardiovascular risk
Behavior change tool â€” users reduce glucose spikes 15-30% through real-time feedback
interactions: High-dose vitamin C may interfere with readings
contraindications: Severe skin conditions at application site
